history.proof: intros x eps. qsimpl use: locally_norm_ball_norm. srun best use: norm_compat1 unfold: ball_norm, locally_norm, pos.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V eps : posreal Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : V, ball_norm ?M2435 eps y -> ball_norm ?M2435 ?M2436 y" with "exists eps0 : posreal, forall y : V, ball_norm x eps0 y -> ball x eps y".
